hero.title: About Glodinas Finance
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for financial services in the Netherlands

company.title: Our Company
company.paragraph1: Glodinas Finance B.V. was founded with a clear mission: to provide accessible, professional financial services to entrepreneurs and businesses in the Netherlands. We specialize in helping both self-employed professionals (ZZP'ers) and limited companies (BVs) navigate the complexities of Dutch financial regulations.
company.paragraph2: Our team combines extensive experience in Dutch tax law, bookkeeping standards, and business administration with a commitment to personalized service. We understand that each client has unique needs, which is why we offer tailored solutions rather than one-size-fits-all packages.
company.paragraph3: Based in Schiphol, we serve clients throughout the Netherlands, with particular expertise in supporting international entrepreneurs and businesses establishing a presence in the Dutch market.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the professionals behind Glodinas Finance

member1.name: Cihat Kaya
member1.bio: Cihat founded Glodinas Finance after years of experience in the Dutch financial sector. He specializes in tax optimization strategies for small businesses and self-employed professionals.
member1.imageAlt: Cihat Kaya - Founder of Glodinas Finance

member2.name: Gabriel Stan
member2.bio: Gabriel brings over 8 years of experience in financial administration and bookkeeping. He oversees client accounts and ensures accurate financial reporting.
member2.imageAlt: Gabriel Stan - Senior Bookkeeper at Glodinas Finance

member3.name: Ana Dogotari
member3.bio: Ana manages client communications and ensures that our services consistently meet the highest standards of quality and client satisfaction.
member3.imageAlt: Ana Dogotari - Client Relations Manager at Glodinas Finance

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive financial solutions tailored to your business needs

bookkeepingZZP.title: Bookkeeping for ZZP'ers
bookkeepingZZP.description1: Our bookkeeping service for self-employed professionals (ZZP'ers) provides a complete financial administration solution that keeps you compliant with Dutch tax regulations while minimizing your administrative burden.
bookkeepingZZP.description2: We use Moneybird, a user-friendly cloud-based platform, to manage your financial records efficiently. This allows you to focus on your core business activities while maintaining full visibility of your financial status.
items: Monthly processing of all financial transactions
Quarterly VAT (BTW) return preparation and filing
Access to Moneybird cloud accounting software

bookkeepingBV.title: Bookkeeping for BVs
bookkeepingBV.description1: Our comprehensive bookkeeping service for Dutch limited companies (BVs) ensures full compliance with all statutory financial reporting requirements while providing valuable insights for business decision-making.
bookkeepingBV.description2: We handle all aspects of your company's financial administration, from day-to-day transaction processing to annual account preparation and corporate tax filings.

payroll.title: Payroll Services
payroll.description1: Our payroll services ensure accurate and timely processing of your employee compensation while maintaining compliance with Dutch labor laws and tax regulations.
payroll.description2: We handle all aspects of payroll administration, from calculating salaries and taxes to generating pay slips and filing required reports with the Dutch Tax Authority.
items: Wage tax return preparation and filing

businessFormation.title: Business Formation
businessFormation.description1: Our business formation service guides entrepreneurs through the process of establishing a legal entity in the Netherlands, whether as a sole proprietorship (eenmanszaak) or a limited company (BV).
businessFormation.description2: We handle all the necessary registrations and administrative requirements, ensuring a smooth and efficient start to your business operations in the Dutch market.

personalLoans.title: Personal Loan Assistance
personalLoans.description1: Our personal loan assistance service helps individuals navigate the Dutch banking system to secure favorable loan terms for personal needs, home purchases, or other significant expenses.
personalLoans.description2: We provide guidance throughout the application process, help prepare the necessary documentation, and liaise with financial institutions to increase your chances of approval.
items: Loan options comparison across multiple banks

taxPreparation.title: Tax Preparation
taxPreparation.description1: Our tax preparation service ensures accurate and timely filing of all required tax returns for both individuals and businesses operating in the Netherlands.
taxPreparation.description2: We leverage our expertise in Dutch tax law to identify all applicable deductions and credits, minimizing your tax liability while maintaining full compliance with tax regulations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions

questions.question: What services do you offer for ZZP'ers?
questions.answer: We offer comprehensive bookkeeping, tax preparation, business formation assistance, and financial advisory services specifically tailored for self-employed professionals (ZZP'ers) in the Netherlands.

questions.question: How much does your bookkeeping service cost?
questions.answer: Our standard bookkeeping package for ZZP'ers starts at €130 per month (excluding VAT), and our BV bookkeeping package starts at €150 per month (excluding VAT). We also offer customized packages based on your specific needs.

questions.question: Do you offer services in English?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide all our services in both English and Dutch, making us an ideal partner for international entrepreneurs and businesses operating in the Netherlands.

questions.question: How do I get started with your services?
questions.answer: You can get started by contacting us through this form, calling us directly, or visiting our office. We'll schedule an initial consultation to discuss your needs and recommend the most suitable services for your situation.

questions.question: Can you help with business registration at the KVK?
questions.answer: Yes, our business formation service includes complete assistance with registering your business at the Dutch Chamber of Commerce (KVK), as well as handling all necessary tax registrations.
